```{r}
library(spict)
load('data/initial_data_occ_df_final.Rdata')
```

# Preproc

```{r}
a = Sys.time()

temp = df_effort_y %>% 
  filter(fill == '2-Southern Coast 2-Bottom Trawl')

timeC = temp$year_sale %>% as.character %>% as.numeric()
timeI = temp$year_sale %>% as.character %>% as.numeric()
obsC = temp$catch
obsI = temp$lpue

modelo_spict = list(timeC = timeC,
                    timeI = timeC,
                    obsC = obsC,
                    obsI = obsI)

modelo_spict$priors$logbkfrac <- c(log(0.8),0.5,1)
modelo_spict$ini$logn <- log(2) #adjust production curve to Shaefer
modelo_spict$phases$logn <- -1
modelo_spict$priors$logalpha <- c(1, 1, 0)
modelo_spict$priors$logbeta <- c(1, 1, 0)

b = Sys.time()
spict_preproc_otb_s_y = b-a
```

# Fit

```{r}
a = Sys.time()

res_spict = fit.spict(modelo_spict)
retro_res = retro(res_spict)

b = Sys.time()
spict_fit_otb_s_y = b-a
```

# Render Outputs

```{r}
a = Sys.time()

xtable(
  rbind(
    sumspict.parest(res_spict),
    sumspict.srefpoints(res_spict)[,1:4])) %>% 
  print(.,
        type = "latex",
        file = "tables/otb/spict_res_otb_s.tex", 
        include.rownames = T,
        only.contents = T)

res_spict_s =  rbind(
    sumspict.parest(res_spict),
    sumspict.srefpoints(res_spict)[,1:4])

save(res_spict_s, file = 'tables/otb/spict_tables_otb_s.Rdata')


png('plots/otb/res_spict_data_otb_s_y.png', height = 10, width = 10, units = 'in', res = 300)
plotspict.data(res_spict)
dev.off()

png('plots/otb/res_spict_res_otb_s_y.png', height = 10, width = 10, units = 'in', res = 300)
par(mfrow = c(2,2))
plotspict.bbmsy(res_spict)
plotspict.ffmsy(res_spict)
plotspict.fb(res_spict)
plotspict.production(res_spict, n.plotyears = 40)
dev.off()

png('plots/otb/res_spict_retro_otb_s_y.png', height = 10, width = 10, units = 'in', res = 300)
plotspict.retro(retro_res)
dev.off()

b = Sys.time()
spict_render_otb_s_y = b-a
```



# Performance 

```{r}
perf_spict_s_otb_y = data.frame('Framework' = 'SPiCT - Bottom Trawl, Southern Coast, Yearly data',
                              'Pre-process' = spict_preproc_otb_s_y,
                              'Model fit' = spict_fit_otb_s_y,
                              'Output Render' = spict_render_otb_s_y)
save(perf_spict_s_otb_y, file = 'benchmarks/spict_otb_s_y.Rdata')
```
